title: New Giro Supernatural gloves are a chamois for your hands, Trixter MTB gloves bring the value
content:
For many riders, wearing cycling shorts with an integrated chamois is just part of riding a bike. That’s allowed companies like Elastic Interface to become experts in chamois technology and comfort, which is exactly why Giro has worked with EIT on their shorts for years. But now, the two companies have developed a new Elastic […]

The post New Giro Supernatural gloves are a chamois for your hands, Trixter MTB gloves bring the value appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
